description:
This is a small but useful application that frees you from having to buy expensive equipment and at the same time eliminate the use of charts and complicated explanations of the sub cooling process.
It's easy to use and always on your pocket, only need to select the sub cooling temperature given by the manufacturer and then update the temperature reading in the liquid line and it will give you the pressure to meet yours selected sub cooling. To adjust the liquid line temperature one degree at the time during the charging process you can use the two arrows on side of the gauge.
versionNote: now Pixi users can scroll down on preference to launch the application
